(Just a bit in the beginning: I know the URL didn't work, I'm trying to fix=
 that as I type. This RPG has nothing to do with the TV show "Beast Machine=
s" I just used the name so you all could see where it takes place. Primal i=
sn't even on the planet, neither are any of the BW TV show Maximals. So you=
 could say it takes place before the show.BTW the Gateway will be visible i=
n 2 days, August 20th)

::CyberShark::

    He was nearing the other Pred b=
ase, the one Hell Beast left. As he neared he received a message from Magma=
tron. He said to return to the Destron base. CyberShark's reaction, "no".
 =
   "Magmatron, I am no longer your pawn," CyberShark said into his comm.
  =
  "Unit Magmatron cannot be located on the planet." The computer replied ba=
ck to him.
    "Magmatron is gone? Is he dead?" CyberShark asked.
    "No r=
esidual part of unit Magmatron can be located upon planet."
